languages.text: "Мы это... ересь изничтожаем. Вот эти малохольные — с корабля, что из недр {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простора Коронус{/g} прибыл. У них там прокаженные! Мутанты! Они гниль разносят, скверну! Да они все..."

traits.locale_text: "Мы это... ересь изничтожаем. Вот эти млохольные — с корабля, что из недр Простора Коронус прибыл. У них там прокаженные! Мутанты! Они гниль разносят, скверну! Да они все..."

languages.text: "We were just, uh... rooting out heresy here. These scrawny ones, they're from the ship that came from the bowels of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. They've got plague there! And mutants! And now they're spreading that rot everywhere, that taint! They're all—"
languages.original_text: "Мы это... ересь изничтожаем. Вот эти малохольные — с корабля, что из недр {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простора Коронус{/g} прибыл. У них там прокаженные! Мутанты! Они гниль разносят, скверну! Да они все..."

"We were just, uh... rooting out heresy here. These scrawny ones, they're from the ship that came from the bowels of the Koronus Expanse. They've got plague there! And mutants! And now they're spreading that rot everywhere, that taint! They're all—"

"We were just, uh... rooting out heresy here. These scrawny ones, they're from the ship that came from the bowels of the Koronus Expanse. They've got plague there! And mutants! And now they're spreading that rot everywhere, that taint! They're all—"

"We were just, uh... rooting out heresy here. These scrawny ones, they're from the ship that came from the bowels of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. They've got plague there! And mutants! And now they're spreading that rot everywhere, that taint! They're all—"

languages.text: 「あ、あの…異端者を排除していただけです。この痩せこけた連中は{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}の奥から着いた船に乗っていたんです。あそこは疫病が蔓延している！変異体ものさばっています！そして、奴らはその腐敗や穢れをそこら中にまき散らしているんだ！こいつらは―」
languages.original_text: "We were just, uh... rooting out heresy here. These scrawny ones, they're from the ship that came from the bowels of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. They've got plague there! And mutants! And now they're spreading that rot everywhere, that taint! They're all—"

traits.locale_text: 「あ、あの…異端者を排除していただけです。この痩せこけた連中は{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}の奥から着いた船に乗っていたんです。あそこは疫病が蔓延している！変異体ものさばっています！そして、奴らはその腐敗や穢れをそこら中にまき散らしているんだ！こいつらは―」

languages.text: “我们只是在，呃……铲除异端。就是这群骨瘦如柴的家伙，他们是从{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}深处乘坐飞船来的。船上有瘟疫！还有变种人！现在他们在到处散播腐化！他们都是——”
languages.original_text: "We were just, uh... rooting out heresy here. These scrawny ones, they're from the ship that came from the bowels of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. They've got plague there! And mutants! And now they're spreading that rot everywhere, that taint! They're all—"

traits.locale_text: “我们只是在，呃……铲除异端。就是这群骨瘦如柴的家伙，他们是从{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}深处乘坐飞船来的。船上有瘟疫！还有变种人！现在他们在到处散播腐化！他们都是——”

languages.text: «Estábamos... purgando unas herejías. Estos enclenques son de la nave que vino de las entrañas de la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}. ¡Y allí tienen la plaga! ¡Y mutantes! ¡Y ahora van a esparcir esa ponzoña por todas partes! ¡Esa infección! Están todos...».
languages.original_text: "We were just, uh... rooting out heresy here. These scrawny ones, they're from the ship that came from the bowels of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. They've got plague there! And mutants! And now they're spreading that rot everywhere, that taint! They're all—"

traits.locale_text: «Estábamos... purgando unas herejías. Estos enclenques son de la nave que vino de las entrañas de la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}. ¡Y allí tienen la plaga! ¡Y mutantes! ¡Y ahora van a esparcir esa ponzoña por todas partes! ¡Esa infección! Están todos...».

languages.text: « On voulait juste... chasser ces hérétiques. Les maigrichons, là, ils ont débarqué d'un vaisseau qui vient du fin fond des {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}. Il y a la peste, là-bas ! Et des mutants ! Ils vont tous nous contaminer ! Ils sont... »
languages.original_text: "We were just, uh... rooting out heresy here. These scrawny ones, they're from the ship that came from the bowels of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. They've got plague there! And mutants! And now they're spreading that rot everywhere, that taint! They're all—"

traits.locale_text: « On voulait juste... chasser ces hérétiques. Les maigrichons, là, ils ont débarqué d'un vaisseau qui vient du fin fond des {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}. Il y a la peste, là-bas ! Et des mutants ! Ils vont tous nous contaminer ! Ils sont... »

languages.text: "Wir gehen, hier, äh ... nur gegen Ketzerei vor. Die Dünnen da sind von dem Schiff, das aus den Tiefen der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} gekommen ist. Dort gibt es Seuchen! Und Mutanten! Und jetzt verbreiten sie diesen Makel überall! Sie sind alle ..."
languages.original_text: "We were just, uh... rooting out heresy here. These scrawny ones, they're from the ship that came from the bowels of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. They've got plague there! And mutants! And now they're spreading that rot everywhere, that taint! They're all—"

traits.locale_text: "Wir gehen, hier, äh ... nur gegen Ketzerei vor. Die Dünnen da sind von dem Schiff, das aus den Tiefen der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} gekommen ist. Dort gibt es Seuchen! Und Mutanten! Und jetzt verbreiten sie diesen Makel überall! Sie sind alle ..."

languages.text: "Biz sadece... Burada kâfirliğin kökünü kazıyorduk. Şu sıskalar, {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği'nin{/g} iç kesimlerinden yola çıkan bir gemiyle gelmişler. Orada salgın varmış! Mutantlar da varmış! Şimdi de o çürüğü, o pisliği her yere yayıyorlar! Bunların hepsi..."
languages.original_text: "We were just, uh... rooting out heresy here. These scrawny ones, they're from the ship that came from the bowels of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. They've got plague there! And mutants! And now they're spreading that rot everywhere, that taint! They're all—"

traits.locale_text: "Biz sadece... Buradaki kâfirliğin kökünü kazıyorduk. Şu sıska tipler {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği{/g}'nin iç kısımlarından yola çıkan bir gemiyle gelmişler. Orada salgın varmış! Mutantlar da varmış! Şimdi de o çürümeyi, o pisliği her yere yayıyorlar! Bunların hepsi..."
